name: Dictionary
description:
This integration uses NLTK to compare with a few pre-defined corpuses. These are as follows:
1. NLTK Word
2. Brown
3. Reuters
4. Webtext

Please follow these integrations to setup and use.
1. Use the test command while setting up the integration to download the corpus data.
2. Run `!find-english-words` command with the following specifications:
   1. courpus - Chose the dictionary corpus
   2. lemmatization - Yes/No
   3. removePunctuation - Yes/No
   4. text - The text within which "English words" need to be searched
Example:
!find-english-words corpus=brown lemmatize=Yes text="It was the best of times, it was the worst of times!" removePunctuation=Yes
author: Richa Priyanka
